id: bigtech:wings drone delivery is coming to 150 more walmarts:2026-01-11T15:00:00.000Z
title: Wing’s drone delivery is coming to 150 more Walmarts
author: Andrew J. Hawkins
summary_long: Wing is bringing drone delivery to even more Walmart stores in 2026. The Alphabet-owned company announced today that its drones will be flying above 150 more locations this year, including in four new cities: Los Angeles, St. Louis, Miami, and Cincinnati. In June 2025, the companies said they would expand their delivery partnership to 100 additional stores in Atlanta, Charlotte, Houston, Orlando, and Tampa. Source: www.theverge.com. Date: 2026-01-11. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: bigtech:that time will smith helped discover new species of anaconda:2026-01-11T20:35:33.000Z
title: That time Will Smith helped discover new species of anaconda
author: Jennifer Ouellette
summary_long: In 2024, scientists announced the discovery of a new species of giant anaconda in South America. A National Geographic camera crew was on hand for the 2022 expedition that documented the new species—and so was actor Will Smith, since they were filming for NatGeo's new documentary series, Pole to Pole with Will Smith. Now we can all share in Smith's Amazon experience, courtesy of the three-minute clip above. Along with venom expert Bryan Fry, we follow Smith's journey by boat with a team of indigenous Waorani guides, scouring the river banks for anacondas. Source: arstechnica.com. Date: 2026-01-11. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: consumer:wings drone deliveries are coming to 150 more walmarts:2026-01-11T18:07:09.000Z
title: Wing's drone deliveries are coming to 150 more Walmarts
author: Jackson Chen
summary_long: Don't be surprised if you see even more drones delivering groceries across the US since the Alphabet-owned Wing announced another service expansion with Walmart over the next year. The partnership said that drone delivery services will be available at 150 more Walmart locations in Los Angeles, St. Louis, Cincinnati, Miami and more metros that have yet to be announced. According to Wing, its top 25 percent of customers have ordered its delivery drones up to three times a week. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2026-01-11. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: space:susan schuh supporting the humans in human spaceflight:2026-01-12T01:00:00.000Z
title: Susan Schuh: Supporting the Humans in Human Spaceflight
author: Sumer Loggins
summary_long: Susan Schuh has dedicated her career to helping humans adapt to life beyond Earth. As the Flight Crew Integration Operational Habitability (OpsHab) team lead in NASA’s Human Health and Performance Directorate at Johnson Space Center in Houston, Schuh leads efforts to understand what it is really like to live and work in space. She turns that information into progress by documenting astronauts’ feedback to improve current and future spaceflight missions. Official portrait of Susan Schuh. Source: www.nasa.gov. Date: 2026-01-12. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: nextfrontiers:greenlands harsh environment and lack of infrastructure have:2026-01-11T19:07:23.000Z
title: Greenland's harsh environment and lack of infrastructure have prevented rare earth mining
summary_long: Greenland's harsh environment, lack of key infrastructure and difficult geology have so far prevented anyone from building a mine to extract the sought-after rare earth elements that many high-tech products require. Even if President Donald Trump prevails in his effort to take control of the Arctic island, those challenges won't go away. Source: techxplore.com. Date: 2026-01-11.
